chapter.title: Source code releases
chapter.p: Please use anonymous Subversion access to acquire source code, connection details are given on SourceForge's site.

chapter.title: Nightly component binaries
chapter.p: These binaries (WAR files) are provided as part of the nightly demo/ integration build. We cannot guarantee these files will work because they are development shapshots.

chapter.title: Installation instructions
chapter.p: Short installation instructions are provided in the readme.txt file in the distribution.
